metadata_entry.name: cps/key_data
metadata_entry.desc: The CPS key data conainer.

metadata_entry.name: cps/object
metadata_entry.desc: This object contains attributes related to CPS operations on an object

metadata_entry.name: cps/object/stat
metadata_entry.desc: Contains the CPS internal statisics for this object.

metadata_entry.name: cps/object/operations/set_min_time
metadata_entry.desc: the fastest response to a set request.

metadata_entry.name: cps/object/operations/set_max_time
metadata_entry.desc: the longest time it took to process a set request.

metadata_entry.name: cps/object/operations/set_ave_time
metadata_entry.desc: the average time it takes to process a set request.

metadata_entry.name: cps/object/operations/set_requests
metadata_entry.desc: the number of set requests.

metadata_entry.name: cps/object/operations/get_min_time
metadata_entry.desc: the fastest response to a get request.

metadata_entry.name: cps/object/operations/get_max_time
metadata_entry.desc: the longest time it took to process a get request.

metadata_entry.name: cps/object/operations/get_ave_time
metadata_entry.desc: the average time it takes to process a get request.

metadata_entry.name: cps/object/operations/get_requests
metadata_entry.desc: the number of get requests.

metadata_entry.name: cps/object/operations/nameservice_reconnects
metadata_entry.desc: the number of reconnections with the name service.

metadata_entry.name: cps/object/operations/nameservice_lost_conn
metadata_entry.desc: Number of times that the NS disconnected.

metadata_entry.name: cps/object/operations/set_failed
metadata_entry.desc: Number of failed set requests.

metadata_entry.name: cps/object/operations/set_invalid_req
metadata_entry.desc: Number of invalid set requests (communication error).

metadata_entry.name: cps/object/operations/get_failed
metadata_entry.desc: Number of failed get requests.

metadata_entry.name: cps/object/operations/get_invalid_req
metadata_entry.desc: Number of invalid set requests due to protocol errors.

metadata_entry.name: cps/object/operations/key_field
metadata_entry.desc: The keys registered with this service

metadata_entry.name: cps/object/operations/close_count
metadata_entry.desc: Number of close operations done with the nameservice.

metadata_entry.name: cps/object/operations/cleanup_runs
metadata_entry.desc: Number of clean ups on cache done due to close connections.

metadata_entry.name: cps/object/operations/events_sent
metadata_entry.desc: Number of events sent by the name service for registration changes.

metadata_entry.name: cps/object/operations/process_id
metadata_entry.desc: The process ID of the application registering for object handling.

metadata_entry.name: cps/object/operations/objects_allocated
metadata_entry.desc: The number of objects that are allocated within the process but not deleted.
